summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDermalogica's Awaken Peptide Eye Gel minimizes the appearance of fine lines and puffiness over time. A powerful blend of caffeine and highly active peptides helps to decrease the appearance of tired, puffy eye bags and helps you fake a full night's sleep.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly firms and smooths skin textureMinimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesReduces the appearance of puffiness around the eye areaKey IngredientsSuccinic Acid Blend: supports a more radiant appearanceSoothing Rosemary Leaf Extract: minimizes the appearance of puffiness and fine linesEverlasting Flower: reduces water loss, improving skin barrier and helps to promote a calming and soothing sensationSubterranea Seed Extract: Leaves skin smoother and more luminous, smooths skin's texture and minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesResearch ResultsStart your morning looking well-rested in just 10 minutes! Quickly reduces the appearance of puffiness and wrinklesIndependent clinical test, 32 subjects, 1 application/day, 4 weeksItem 2588994How To UseApply under the eye and along the orbital bone. Keep out of eyes.Precautions: Keep out of eyes.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Polysilicone-11, Glycerin, Maltodextrin, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Butylene Glycol, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Caffeine, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Coleus Forskohlii Root Extract, Helichrysum Italicum Extract, Voandzeia Subterranea Seed Extract, Lactic Acid, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Pentylene Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Diosmine, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Laureth-12, Chrysin, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Sorbitan Oleate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Barium Sulfate, Sodium Carbonate, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Hydroxide, Propanediol, Sodium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Succinic Acid.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply under the eye and along the orbital bone. Keep out of eyes.Precautions: Keep out of eyes.

reviews.headline: Glow
reviews.comments: There is a feeling of hudration and a glow that was not there before.

reviews.headline: Did not work for me
reviews.comments: Bought for under eye bags. I tried using just once a day for the first couple days and did not see a difference at all. Then I tried putting on two and 3 times in a span of 2 hours. Still nothing.

reviews.headline: Love love love!
reviews.comments: First of, DOES NOT irritate my sensative skin at all! Love the ingridents, definitely depuffs and makes my 34 year-old under eyes look tighter and brighter. Higher price but you get what tou pay for with eye creams/serums.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Great product.  It works.  It definitely reduces puffiness.

reviews.headline: Quality product for your face
reviews.comments: I have been using Dermalogica line of products for 18 years and they really are great for the skin.  They are pricey so make sure you have the long term budget to maintain them.

reviews.headline: Reacts to makeup
reviews.comments: I have used Dermalogica products for many years and almost exclusively and I love the brand but the Awaken Peptides are a HUGE disappointment!  I've read the instructions for use of this product but it doesn't say that you should let it cure for a while before applying anything over it.  If I apply concealer over it within a few minutes the concealer gobs up then when I try an eye sponge to smooth it out it turns into shreds and will even get into my hair - then have to use a big dry sponge to remove the shreds.  Have tried different brands of concealers but the reaction is the same. It's infuriating!  I can't even say it does it's job because I can't leave it under my eyes AND apply makeup or even makeup primer after applicaion.  This stuff is not cheap!  and I would love to return it and get my money back.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: this is the only product that I will buy for full price if I run out. it is the best eye cream that I have used and I have been using them since high-school. you will NOT regret trying this. works great with makeup too.

reviews.headline: I would but and highly recommend this product
reviews.comments: I love this product

reviews.headline: I would Prbly try another product.
reviews.comments: Worked right away but the effects didn't last as much as I had read in some of the reviews. Maybe just need to wait and see better results over a longer time of daily use.  Very expensive for such a small tube.  For that price, better product

reviews.headline: Does nothing for dark circles or eye bags
reviews.comments: I have used dermalogica forever but Ulta recently stopped carrying their anti aging eye cream I have always used. Rather than pay shipping to get it from dermalogica directly I picked this stuff up at my local Ulta to try instead. I've been using it 3 months now and honestly I feel like my dark circles and eye bags are more prominent now than they were with the other eye cream. This also does not feel hydrating at all. It absorbs quickly and makes the skin feel tight. I will definitely be switching to something else. Would not recommend and would not use again.

reviews.headline: The best I have ever used
reviews.comments: This product is the best eye depuffing I have ever used ! I have terrible swollen puffy eyes all the time with wrinkles and I tried this in the store and within minutes I could not believe my eyes "literally ". The swelling and wrinkles had disappeared even my husband was shocked he said I looked 10 years younger we both couldn't believe it !  I am so glad I have finally found something that actually works ! I do use other dermalogica products and they never disappoint!

reviews.headline: works very good
reviews.comments: would recommend

reviews.headline: Works
reviews.comments:
I put this on over my makeup lightly dotting until it is absorbed.  Not rubbing.
I put it on my eyelid and under my eye and extended a bit to my corners of eye/cheek bone.
Not too much and just dotting it with my finger tip lightly.
It adds a calmness and a rested look, very stubtle but enough for me to notice pretty nicely
when I wear it vs. I do not.
I have not found another eye treatment that gives this affect.
Hoping it also gives some long term effects.
Will def. buy again.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Trying Clinique

reviews.headline: Unbelievable!
reviews.comments: I received this as a sample. My eyes look 5 years younger in less than 2 weeks! It seems like the exact product my eyes needed. The darkness is visibly reduced, my eyes are smoother and don't look tired at all. I'm thoroughly impressed with this eye gel.

reviews.headline: Love this eye cream
reviews.comments: Amazing   Can apply make up after applying absorbed quickly

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: I've been using Dermalocia for years and I'm surprised this made it past production as results are minimal and it peels under concealer, regardless of how long it is left to set, which is unacceptable at this price point.

reviews.headline: Great...if you don't wear make-up!!
reviews.comments: I think this is a great eye gel for those who don't wear makeup, but makeup wearers beware! Pros: I love how quickly this eye gel depuffs my undereye, and the cooling sensation is refreshing as well. Cons: This gel and makeup don't play well together; they create a weird texture and peel.

reviews.headline: Awful. Don't waste your money
reviews.comments:
Pro:
This product does have a quick effect

Con:
It makes my eyes water and have a burning sensation like crazy. 
Doesn't sit well with my  foundation either. 

Do not recommend!

reviews.headline: Would not recommend this eye gel
reviews.comments: I love Dermalogica and all there products are amazing but for some reason this eye gel doesn't go well for your before make up routine. I use Lanc√¥me foundation and these two did not like each other. Disappointed especially with how much I paid for and such a little amount.

properties.name: Cons

values.label: does not go well with makeup

display_values: does not go well with makeup

faceoff_positive.comments: I have been using this eye cream for a few weeks now, at least once a day, every day, and I love it. I have tried many different eye creams over the years to try and keep the area hydrated and have found most affordable creams do little and you have to get the high end cosmeceuticals to get a noticeable improvement. Then I tried this eye cream and it changed my opinion. My work is constantly stressful and hectic at the moment and with wearing PPE every shift you just cannot be kind to yourself (dehydrating, sweating profusely in the PPE, long hours etc). So you can imagine the delicate skin around the eyes really shows when you are tired and your face ends up in not great shape constantly. This cream has helped me not look so much like I have not slept properly since 2019 even though I am lucky to get 5hrs a night. It is light and absorbs quickly, whilst still giving an hydrated feeling to the skin all day. I cannot stand the feeling of any product lingering on my skin and I do not wear makeup so I notice immediately if products feel greasy or present on my face. The texture is a semi-opaque gel creme, that is not too firm or liquidy. You do not need heaps to get a good effect and it spreads well with fingertip tapping without feeling like you are dragging the skin. You can see it start to work on puffy, tired eyes within about 5-10 minutes but it does not give you that tightness of some de-puffing eye creams (hate that feeling). I wear contacts as well so having product that does not irritate, even if you get sweat into your eyes, taking the product with it, is vital for me. This does not irritate and has also gone well under the light matte type facial sun screens you can get now. Have not tried with makeup. Does not have any heavy fragrance to it. Definitely works to reduce the appearance of light fine lines and light-moderate darkness under eyes from normal lack of sleep. Packaging is lovely and you can easy dispense just the right amount, even if you keep it in the fridge, which makes it feel even more refreshing. The only tiny pilling I noticed was when I would try to reapply the cream without first cleansing my face (yes I know bad idea) and if I rubbed my eyes but other than that you could happily reapply a top up at end of hard day if needed in an emergency. Overall definitely recommend giving this a try morning or night it definitely worked for me and the amount in the tube is good value for the price
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Everyday Saviour for Exhausted Eyes

faceoff_negative.comments: I've been trying out many of the popular new eye care treatments on the market right now aimed to have immediate results at eliminating wrinkles, puffiness and bags. I was excited when Dermalogica gifted me their Awaken Peptide Eye Gel for my honest review. Unfortunately I was left unimpressed. I truly love Dermalogica and haven't ever had a product not have results for me so this took me by surprise. I am going to give it a try on my husband (when he returns from his long trip) as he has very noticeable bags. I did like the nice cooling affect I received from this gel. It felt great in the morning. I'm hoping over time to see more results and  will be sure to come back and share my thoughts at that time. I left this review on their other eye cream but the link I clicked on directed to the wrong product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not my favorite I've tried
